newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL - Medic shrs pounded down.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL - Medic shrs pounded down.

text.p: Medic Computer System Inc shares were in a freefall during U.S. pre-open trade Monday, buyers disappearing after Medic said first quarter results will be below Wall Street expectations.
Traders said Medic stock fell to 15 from 28, then edged lower, settling in the 14-1/8 to 14-5/8 range.

Early this morning, the developer of physician practice management systems said it expects first-quarter earnings per share of $0.14 to $0.18, below analysts' expectations of about $0.27 per share and the year ago's $0.21 per share.

IDEXX Laboratories Corp shares suffered the same type of early selloff, its shares tumbling to 19 from 32 after the biotechnology company said it expects first quarter earnings of $0.02 to $0.05 per share on revenues of $60 to $65 million.
According to Zack's Investment Research, the consensus analyst earnings expectation was $0.22 per share.
Elsewhere in pre-open trade, Cisco Systems shares slipped to 48-5/8 from 49-1/4, 3Com added 1/4 to 33-3/8 and Ascend Communications Inc fell to 48-7/8 from 49-3/8.
